Initializer# init(id:calibration:type:presentationFrameRate:pose:)

macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
init(
    id: String,
    calibration: ImmersiveCameraCalibration,
    type: ImmersiveCamera.CameraType = .stereoCamera,
    presentationFrameRate: Int = defaultPresentationFrameRate,
    pose: Pose3DFloat = .identity
)
```
